Cool.  It's well worth the effort


Don't be envious of what you don't have=
, be grateful for things you already posses.  Nothing is worth more than fa=
mily and friends.

On Dec 28, 2011, at 12:06 PM, Super Cyclonus <supercyclo=
nus@...> wrote:

> Thanks Sandy, I will look into that. I had it once=
 before but lost it
> when I changed a few things around. :)
> 
> - Preston=

> 
> On 12/28/11, Sandy <magicquartz@...> wrote:
> > Just today, one=
 of my friends on Yahoo mail had their account broken into
> > and me and m=
y friends received the fraudulent email. Apparently there is a
> > rash of =
accounts being broken into on yahoo. Before it happens to you,
> > there is=
 something you can do to prevent intrusion. And here it is:
> >
> > 1: Sign=
 into your account info.
> >
> > 2: Scroll down to SECOND SIGN IN VERIFICAT=
ION.
> >
> > 3: Click on that, it will send you a verification number and g=
ive you the
> > option
> > Of sending that number to another email, other t=
han yahoo, or through your
> > mobile phone, which is ten times safer by th=
e way.
> >
> > 4: If you have a mobile number, click on the option to just =
send it through
> > there rather than the email.
> >
> > 5: The verificatio=
n code will need to be verified on the computer. Type
> > the number exactl=
y how it was sent to you and then you're done.
> >
> > What this will do is=
 make it impossible for hackers to access your account.
> > If they try an =
unauthorized login they will fail miserably. There's more
> > info related =
to this in your account profile section. It's really worth the
> > time inv=
estment.
> >
> >
> 

--Apple-Mail-BCA34BDB-0DEF-4D0D-A45F-826EBA05BC44
